group_1.textLeft: [chara:303001:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]*Giggle* I'm glad I could make them happy.
Welcome! No, actually I just work here@part-time.
I mean...Kanagi Izumi! What are you@doing here?!

group_1.textRight: Hm, you know who I am?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, of course I do! You're famous among@Magical Girls!
Anyone who's been a Magical Girl more@than a year would recognize you!

group_1.textRight: The artist said the same thing.
She's a Magical Girl I met recently.
She draws manga, so I call her an artist.
She mentors me on being a maid as well.

group_1.textLeft: Um...I'm just surprised at how chatty you@actually are.
I thought you were more of a quiet,@scary kind of person.

group_1.textRight: Scary?[chara:101601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101601:cheek_0][chara:101601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:motion_100][chara:101601:lipSynch_1] I think of myself as a kind, sisterly@type.
It would've saved me a lot of time if I'd@known you were a Magical Girl.
I'd have found you much sooner.

group_1.textLeft: Y-you were looking for me? Why?

group_1.textRight: It's about what happened at the cafe.
I wanted to ask what it was that I lacked.
I can't even tell what it was I did wrong@as a maid.
I haven't been able to stop thinking about@it.
Would you please help me figure it out?

group_1.textLeft: All right. But I don't know how helpful@I'll be.
